page.title: 18THE LIFE OF A 9 YEAR OLD
page.content:
Then we write a story then in the afternoon we do craft. When its half past three we go home and do our homework then watch some television. We have dinner then watch some television. Our school has five rooms the resource room, the boys cloakroom and the girls cloakroom and the infants room and the juniors room. In the junior room there is a television and a record player and musical instruments. There are groups of tables and a desk that Mrs Onions sits at and a blackboard.
Darren Crush Age 9
